html:
10.22.24  10:08 pm   Got any grapes?

      no

10.22.24  9:21 pm   Thoughts on the word 'conglomerate'? 

      easier said than done

10.22.24  9:21 pm   i have my sister's blue acoustic guitar with 2 strings, and I tuned them to F and Bb and I can play One Note Samba with them now. how do you feel about that, if applicable

      you really can't. the magic of one note samba is the chords. one note samba is nothing without the chords. it's like those commercials where they show a head-on view of a person, and they show that same person in 100 locations. it's all the same person, and it's all the same angle, but they're in 100 different locations. one note samba without the chords would be like that without the locations

10.22.24  8:05 pm   how many of your currently held opinions do you think are wrong, as a proportion?

      about 50%. to be fair, that might include this one

10.22.24  6:05 pm   what are some good and useful clichés?

      hi

10.22.24  6:00 pm   What gave you the idea to set up a questions page on your website? Like, did anything inspire you?

      like most things, i tried it on other platforms first and then got frustrated that i wasn't allowed to display the questions in purple

10.22.24  5:13 pm   When you write a song, do you write the words, melody, and chords all simultaneously, or am I missing something here?

      the words melody and chords all happen at the same time, and they rely vitally on each other, so really the best case scenario is that they are come to mind as one. and usually that's what happens. if i catch myself going too far ahead with one or the other, the meaning starts to fade. so i have to go back and do it all together again

10.22.24  4:34 pm   How do you create songs that sound so effortless but also seem packed with meaning? I guess that's sort of the nature of abstract art, but still, I envy your skill in crafting these scripts.

      i'm kind of a meaning farmer, but the downside is that it makes you go insane

10.22.24  4:10 pm   is it okay with you if I go totally crazy?  like, exit my gourd permanently

      not exactly

10.22.24  2:45 pm   why is it so hard for me to believe that 5x15=75? i know it's true. i keep double checking it using different methods, but it's so hard for me to believe. is it time to whip out a calculator [app]?

      i was assuming you'd already done that. but if not, then, yes it is

10.22.24  1:32 pm   can you make this text attractive

      i've done my best

10.22.24  10:02 am   what do you do when life gives you lemonade

      give life something else in exchange for the lemonade

10.22.24  3:51 am   How can one be habitual in making animations?

      just go ahead and make all the animations. then you'll be done

10.21.24  11:51 pm   How often do you notice what people are wearing?

      once per time

10.21.24  10:47 pm   what are your thoughts on music reviews? consequently, what are your thoughts on people who review music?

      it's kind of like reviewing colors

10.21.24  8:04 pm   how to do well in chemistry class

      you have to think like a chemical

10.21.24  7:51 pm   what's your favorite question from this site

      this one, surely

10.21.24  7:05 pm   do you ever waltz with the flowers?

      only in the chorus

10.21.24  6:52 pm   What are the best ice cream flavors? 

      good, bad,

10.21.24  5:56 pm   do people still do philosophy but like serious philosophy? i think i'm a philosopher

      philosophy is what ideas are called after they've sat in stone for a few hundred years. new ideas and new thinkers have trouble getting that type of prestige. unless one of your ancestors was one of the original philosophers

10.21.24  4:32 pm   have you noticed that ireland sort of looks like a koala?

     no

     the world we live in hides such delightful surprises sometimes

      i have noticed that

10.21.24  12:27 pm   are you clumsy

      no

10.21.24  12:14 pm   is life a puzzle game?

      sort of

10.21.24  11:50 am   am I allowed to bring my food and drink onto this site

      i don't know if it's possible

10.21.24  10:59 am   is it healthy to hate

      no, but, strangely enough, it's not healthy to hate hate either. to make it weirder still, it's also unhealthy to claim to not hate anything. actually now that i think about it, everything is healthy. nevermind

10.21.24  10:19 am   Would you eat a grape flavored apple?

      not necessarily

10.21.24  1:31 am   Why did chain mail go out of style

      everyone started using email

10.21.24  12:38 am   How did you get the location for the video Perfect? I live right by the strip mall its based on, it was insane when I realized it was your the same strip mall in your video. 

      it was selected randomly. then the video was written based on what might happen there

10.21.24  12:01 am   how do you push a rabbit *into* a hat?

      that's a closely guarded industry secret

10.20.24  10:33 pm   what are your thoughts on π

      it's a souvenir of the particular way our spatial world is laid out

10.20.24  10:21 pm   Why do so many of these questions have bad punctuation?

      perhaps some people are just bad people

10.20.24  10:18 pm   Do you compose chord by chord, or do you have whole chord sequences planned out?

      the chords go along with the melody and words. the melody/words/chords all happen at the same time. but i still don't get what you're asking in terms of time, because i don't see how your 2 suggestions would differ from each other. it sounds like "do you walk 1 step at a time, have you already walked the entire distance"

10.20.24  9:21 pm   when youre creating a piece of art, do you find yourself feeling more accomplished when you:
    a) plan out every bit of song, story, words, visuals, character, ect. separately in advance and put it together like a puzzle before you create it;
    b) create everything all at once letting the art take the reins like floating down a stream;
    c) something else entirely (in which case im curious cause I only know how to do those two things).

      some things need to be planned. for example, a house. you can't improvise the contstruction of a house. other things, like a vocal recording of a person laughing, are better off improvised

10.20.24  9:19 pm   do you believe in a deterministic universe,

     no

      and if so, do you believe all of your songs have already been written

      in a way of thinking, all possible versions of all songs have been written infinite times before, in infinite different alternate universes. but which exact trajectory i follow now, that's still largely up in the air at each moment

10.20.24  8:08 pm   Do you think the electoral college should be abolished and instead have elections decided by popular vote? 

      whichever way would have been better for the person you wanted to win. for example, if the person you are rooting for gets the popular vote but doesn't win, then yes the electoral college should be abolished because it doesn't make sense. but if the person you are rooting for wins the election but not the popular vote, then in that case the electoral college is a good and smart system which has existed for many years for good reasons

10.20.24  8:00 pm   shouldn't Chick Corea be named Dude Corea

      no, although perhaps Armando

10.20.24  7:08 pm   can you erase an eraser and if so why are erasers so popular

      you can effectively erase an eraser, although it is usually called 'using up' an eraser. they are popular because they are useful, but if you are wondering how there could be so many despite this, that would be of course because new erasers are also being made

10.20.24  6:07 pm   is it possible to answer this question with just a four-letter word?

      sure

10.20.24  5:44 pm   how do you invent things??

      how did you think of the idea of asking me this

10.20.24  5:04 pm   sometimes i get stuck in the pattern of "i need to do a thing" -> "i don't do the thing which makes me feel guilty" -> "the guilt makes me want to do the thing even less" -> "the longer i don't do the thing the bigger the guilt gets and the less i want to do the thing". its not a very fun cycle. obviously the solution here is "just do the thing" but my brain doesnt seem capable of that for some reason. do you have any advice for how i can push myself to do the thing?

      the solution here is what i call a 'walk and talk'. grab your favorite voice memo recorder, and start walking around and explaining your situation. explain all those feelings, explain the state of the project, and you will probably discover a lot of things you didn't even realize about your relationship with the work at this moment. this should help a lot

10.20.24  10:44 am   have you ever been asked this question before?

      yes

10.20.24  9:47 am   what is your ideal life

      figuring out how to solve problems

10.20.24  7:51 am   what the heck is a pickup? it doesn't even pick stuff up!

      'pick up' is just a basic english phrase which means at least like 20 different things. probably even more, as you go into different specified technical fields. sometimes pickups do indeed pick things up. sometimes 'pickup' means pickup truck. you can pick things up in a pickup truck, in this case 'pick up' meaning retrieve, not lift. like i said, dozens of meanings with that phrase

10.20.24  7:25 am   Are beds just soft tables with short legs that you're supposed to lie on?

      no

10.20.24  2:56 am   do you ever think about the taste of electricity

      no, but i think about the concept of electricity

10.20.24  2:54 am   hi! would you like to buy some vinyl siding?

      maybe we could all share the same vinyl siding

10.20.24  1:29 am   How do you come up with ideas?

     ideas are like magic. no one knows where they come from

      I consider myself pretty good at different things, but I don't ever really know what to do with my skills or to practice.

      in that case, just do everything

10.19.24  11:57 pm   I am wrestling with a notion that is troubling me. I wouldn't call it an existential crisis, but it does touch on a seemingly universal human experience. You see, there is an assumption that no one seems to have questioned. This assumption is that there be a link between the feeling of love or affinity and the action of entering relationships with others. But why should I pursue someone, make them mine, change myself and them in the process, live life with interrelated fates, do all these things, just because I have the ability to fall in love? Heck, why even make friends with anyone? Is it just because I like being around them, because I don't want to be alone? But what's wrong with being alone? Why ask for more?

      i'm not necessarily following all of your phrasings there, but, how about this: being alone is difficult but also rewarding. being not alone is also difficult and rewarding. can't win, can't lose. actually that's not true, you will win and lose. life is about winning and losing constantly

10.19.24  11:15 pm   how do i (someone who has been influenced a bit by the gen-alpha culture and slang) reconcile the addition of Σ into my math class vocabulary, with the current meaning i have for Σ

      you're gonna be fine. things can have 2 meanings. gen-alpha loves double meanings

10.19.24  10:52 pm   tell me a lie

      i'll try
